content.p: For enquiries relating to the Ingenuity Lab, please email the Ingenuity Lab team For enquiries about The Haydn Green Institute for Innovation and Entrepreneurship, please email business-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Dr David Achtzehn Assistant Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Co-Director of MSc Entrepreneurship Programmes Rachel Bedrock Administrative Assistant, Ingenuity Lab Dr Punita Bhatt Assistant Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation Craig Butterworth Senior Administrator Ingenuity Programme Professor Rob Carroll Professor of Practice Venture Capital & Private Equity Dr Christopher Carter Assistant Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Director of MSc Entrepreneurship Programmes Dr Gary Chapman Assistant Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation Dr Tom Coogan Assistant Professor in Entrepreneurship and Innovation Claire Donaldson Senior Manager: Business Development (HGI) and Ingenuity Programme Professor David Falzani Professor of Practice Sustainable Wealth Creation Jos√© Francisco Gonzalez Ingenuity Learning Support Development Officer Tracey Hassall-Jones Manager, Young Entrepreneurs Scheme Dr Terri Holloway Manager, Ingenuity Lab Professor Susan Marlow Research Director, Professor of Entrepreneurship Professor Simon Mosey Director, HGI, Professor of Entrepreneurship & Innovation Dr Hannah Noke Deputy Director, HGI, Associate Professor of Entpreneurship & Innovation Dr Isobel O'Neil Associate Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation Dr Lorna Treanor Assistant Professor of Entrepreneurship & Innovation Janet Wallace Manager, Witty Entrepreneurial Scholarships Dr Robert Wapshott Associate Professor in Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Associate Dean (Ranking and Reputation) Dr Bin Wu Senior Research Fellow Jubilee Campus Nottingham NG8 1BB Email: ingenuitylab@nottingham.ac.uk
